short_summary: Supply of a hands free Ti:Sapphire femtosecond oscillator
description: The National Research Council (NRC) Security and Disruptive Technologies of Canada has a requirement for the supply of a hands free Ti:Sapphire femtosecond oscillator for the Ultrafast Quantum Photonics facilities on Sussex, in Ottawa.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Acquisition of Ti:Sapphire Femtosecond Oscillator

#### Contract Identifier
*Reference Number:* cb-293-68300988
*Contract Amendment Number:* 2

#### Solicitation Information
*Publication Date:* July 8, 2024
*Tender Opening Date:* July 23, 2024 14:00:00
*Solicitation Number:* 24-58080

#### Project Overview
The National Research Council (NRC) Security and Disruptive Technologies of Canada invites bids for the supply of a hands-free Ti:Sapphire femtosecond oscillator for the Ultrafast Quantum Photonics facility on Sussex Drive, Ottawa.

#### Project Details
* Expected contract start date and end date: To be determined
* UN/SPSC codes: 41100000 (Laboratory and scientific equipment) and 43221804 (Optical networking lasers)
* Trade agreements include Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Regions of opportunity, regions of delivery, and contracting entity information are available for view

#### Contracting Entity
* Contracting Entity: National Research Council Canada
* Address: 100 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada (K1N 5A2)
* Contact Person: Roberta Ranaldi
* Contact Email: [roberta.ranaldi@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:roberta.ranaldi@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: (613) 299-8229

#### Tender Attachments
The complete Tender Notice document and technical requirements are available for download at the following URL: [Document Link](https:)

#### Notice Status
Note: This is an expired tender notice.

---

This tender notice provides the procurement requirements for a Ti:Sapphire femtosecond oscillator and is solely intended for reference purposes. Any questions, inquiries, or interest in the tender notice can be directed to the primary contact listed above.
